caption.p: XRD spectra of Si 3N 4@Si@Cu anode material ( a) after lithiation to 0.05 V and ( b) after delithiation to 1.20 V in a half cell vs. Li +/Li. The standard XRD spectra of Si 3N 4 (ICDD:98-064-4680), Si (ICDD:98-042-6975), SiO 2 (ICDD:98-005-1701), Cu (ICDD:98-062-7117), Li 2O (ICDD:98-018-2028), LiSi (ICDD:98-008-3826), and Li 3N(ICDD:98-003-478) are given for comparison.
